sourcesContent:
import {Component} from 'react' import './index.css' class DigitalTimer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { secondsCount: '00', minutesCount: '25', isTimerRunning: false, timerLimit: 25, } } componentDidMount() { const {secondsCount, minutesCount, isTimerRunning} = this.state if (isTimerRunning) { this.decreaseCount = setInterval(this.timeCount, 1000) } } timeCount = () => { this.setState(prevState => ({secondsCount: prevState.secondsCount - 1})) } startPauseTimer = () => { this.setState(prevState => ({isTimerRunning: !prevState.isTimerRunning})) } render() { const {secondsCount, minutesCount, isTimerRunning, timerLimit} = this.state let timerStatus let timerBtnText let iconUrl let iconAlt if (isTimerRunning) { timerStatus = 'Running' timerBtnText = 'Pause' iconUrl = 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/pause-icon-img.png' iconAlt = 'pause icon' } else { timerStatus = 'Paused' timerBtnText = 'Start' iconUrl = 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/play-icon-img.png' iconAlt = 'play icon' } return (

Digital Timer

{minutesCount}:{secondsCount}

{timerStatus}

Set Timer Limit

{timerLimit}

) } } export default DigitalTimer
